channel.title: Internet Help Needed Please
channel.description:
Hi
Im having problems with my network at the moment Is there anyone who can help me :). I have a wired to wireless set up(see diagram). I am having trouble getting all 3 computers connected. All my equipment is new and works perfectly but dosnt seem to like handling a 3rd computer. Is there somthing that might be wrong with my settings?
------------------- ------------------- ----------------- -COMPUTER1 - -computer 2 - -computer3 - - - - - - - ------------------- ------------------- ----------------- [________________________[__________________] [ [ [ ____________
-Switch - - - ____________ [ [ [ ____________
-wirless bridge- - - ____________
____________
-wirless - - router - ____________
[ [ [ [ ____________
-modem - - - ____________

item.title: Internet Help Needed Please
item.dc:creator: @death-droid death-droid
item.description:
@death-droid wrote:

umm i dont think that would work becuase two computers are working perfectley(there corded to a switcher then the switcher is connected to the wirless bridge)

Read full topic

item.title: Internet Help Needed Please
item.dc:creator: @mprules mprules
item.description:
@mprules wrote:

Well are u using a wirles card? If so…

You should have a little green box or computer thing at bottom it will be the name of your wirless card , go there and then go to networks and scan till you find the name of yours and connect to it.

Read full topic
